value:
To think that the wind can carry the
stink of war to a country as peaceful
as this one... It is a sin.

People love to flatter me, so they call
me a tactician.$k$pI'm hardly an ambitious man, but I
do hate to see movement wasted.

On patrol? Excellent. Understanding
the situation on the ground is the first
step to formulating a strategy.$k$pYou ought never forget that
thoroughness is a virtue.

What a solemn expression! Though a
humble clergyman I may be, you must
feel free to consult with me anytime.

Have you seen the castle's library?
What a collection! Such history! I
can't wait to spend time perusing it.

I bring with me a greeting from
$Nf...$k$pAnd may my lord protect you.
My lord Bragi, I give thanks.

May my lord's divine protection
fall upon us all.
I am unworthy...

Such power... I shall exert myself
to live up to your expectations.

I am Saias of Velthomer. With my lord
Bragi as my guide, I hope my poor
abilities will be of some service.

How are you faring? Your face is
twisted into a most curious
expression...$k$pIt's almost as if you can see the future
itself laid out in front of you.$k$pI overestimate you? But only one who
is extraordinary need protest that they
are ordinary...$k$pMy blood has granted me gifts, it's
true. I have expended every effort to
be worthy of those gifts.$k$pThat same blood makes it impossible
for me to live a peaceful life. That's
a lesson I learned from my mother...$k$pAs long as you do not stray from your
path, my knowledge and abilities will
remain at your disposal.$k$pI swear it on the flame that marks my
skin.
はっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
As expected...
All of this was inevitable.
You should retreat.
You'll never defeat me.
It's all going to plan.
I can do no more...
(Sigh)
I can't discuss the topic of my lineage, I'm afraid.
Eh? My, you aren't shy, are you?
A thousand pegasi led by one dragon can defeat a thousand dragons led by one pegasus.
The Heroes gathered here are as dragons. I suppose that you, too, could be called a dragon.
Lord Julius was once kindhearted. Since that fateful day, however...
As the descendant of Fjalar, I must live on.
It would pain me to leave you...so I shall accompany you a while longer.
Yes.
What do you need?
I'll hear your plan.
